title: How to Delete Your Pottermore Account

steps.title: Log in to your Pottermore account.
steps.content: Log in to your Pottermore account. This should take you directly to your profile. If it doesn't, click 'Profile' in the top right corner.

steps.title: Scroll down.
steps.content: Scroll down. At the bottom of the page, under 'Confirm Changes', there is small text that states, 'To close your Pottermore account, click here.' Click on the highlighted blue text.

steps.title: Enter your password and select 'Yes, close my account'.
steps.content: Enter your password and select 'Yes, close my account'.
